content: 15 4 sew the tail at the bottom back of the body pic 16 5 use blue yarn to embroider the triangular patterns on totoro s belly 6 sew the bag on one arm of the totoro pic 17 18 13 14 ig demiwool 15 16 17 18 if you ve made it this far - congratulations you re all done i hope you enjoyed the process of making blue totoro demiwool
